key_statement.statement: Calyx-lobes heavily covered with dark gland-tipped hairs; petals roseate (except in albino); fruit dry and insipid
Calyx-lobes canescent-pilose or villous, rarely with some short pale glands; petals white; fruit juicy and of rich flavor
